# Introduction


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

# Attach proper packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(kableExtra)
library(lubridate)
library(calecopal)
```

 <!-- Open up the data using `read_csv()` -->
 
```{r}
snowshoe <- read_csv(here("data", "bonanza_hares.csv"))

snowshoe_traps <- snowshoe %>% 
  mutate(date = mdy(date),
         year = year(date)) %>% 
  group_by(year)

ggplot(snowshoe_traps, aes(x= year)) +
  geom_bar(fill = "#B4AA98")+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1998:2012) +
  labs(x = "Year of Trapping",
       y = "Number of Snowshoe Hares Traped") +
  ggtitle("Number of Snowshoe Hares Trapped Between 1998-2012 (SILVA)")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
        panel.background = element_rect("#D7DCE4")) 
```
